findings.rationale: The confidentiality obligations terminate after three years, which may not be sufficient for certain sensitive information.
findings.evidence_quote: This Agreement shall remain in effect for three (3) years from the date of execution, after which the obligations shall terminate.

findings.risk_title: Lack of Clear Definition of Confidential Information
findings.rationale: The broad definition of Confidential Information may lead to disputes over what is considered confidential.
findings.evidence_quote: Confidential Information includes all proprietary information, trade secrets, business plans, financial data, and technical information disclosed by either party.

findings.risk_title: Ambiguity in Return of Materials Clause
findings.rationale: The clause does not specify the method or timeline for returning or destroying confidential information.
findings.evidence_quote: Upon termination, each party shall return or destroy all Confidential Information received from the other party.
